commonLongStringError: Unfortunately, an error occurred. The field should have no more than 300 characters
finalWords: Thank you! Your NFT is being created and will be deployed to the MINA blockchain. In the meantime, you can ask me questions about Mina NFT, and I will answer with the help of AI
afterFinalWords: Thank you for the additional information!
typeError: Sorry, but I do not support this file type. I accept: pdf, doc, docx, odt, and txt. Also, the file should be no more than 15 Mb
username: Please choose your Mina NFT avatar name
usernameError: Unfortunately, an error occurred. The name should contain no more than 30 characters, start with a letter, and only include letters, digits, and underscores
description: Please describe your NFT by texting me or sending me a voice message and I will generate the picture for it, or just send me a picture
descriptionError: Unfortunately, an error occurred. The description should contain no more than 1000 characters
createNFT: Let's create another Mina NFT. Please choose your the name for your NFT
buyNFT: Let's buy an amazing MINA NFT. Look at what NFTs are available for sale
archetype: Generating archetype NFT. Please wait a few minutes
authorizationCode: You can use this authorization code in minanft.io or the minanft nodejs library
Secretkeynotcreated: The secret key for your Mina Avatar NFT {{username}} has not been created yet
chooseNFTname: Please choose your Mina NFT avatar name
nameTaken: This name is already taken. Please choose another Mina NFT avatar name
nameReserved: This name is reserved. Please choose another Mina NFT avatar name
midjourney: Please run the Midjourney discord bot's /imagine command using the prompt above to generate your NFT image
IPFSerroruri: NFT deployment: IPFS error. Cannot upload URI. Please try again later by typing the command "new"
IPFSerrorimage: NFT deployment: IPFS error. Cannot upload image. Please try again later by typing the command "new"
Errordeployingcontract: NFT deployment: Error deploying the contract to the MINA blockchain. Please try again later by typing the command "new"
ErrordeployingNFT: NFT deployment: Error deploying the NFT to the MINA blockchain. Please try again later by typing the command "new"
ErrorconvertingIPFShash: NFT deployment: Error converting the IPFS hash of the NFT. Please try again later by typing the command "new"
Cannotsetnewpasssword: NFT deployment: Error deploying the NFT to the MINA blockchain. Cannot set a new password for the NFT. Please try again later by typing the command "new"
sucessDeploymentMessage:
Success! NFT {{nftname}} is written to the MINA blockchain: https://minascan.io/devnet/tx/{{hash}}

You can view it at https://minanft.io/{{nftname}}
sucessDeploymentMessageZeko:
Success! NFT {{nftname}} is written to the Zeko blockchain: https://minanft.io/rollup/tx/{{hash}}

You can view it at https://minanft.io/nft/i{{ipfs}}
Iwanttosell: I want to sell my Mina NFT
ReservationNFTname: Reservation of the MINA Avatar NFT name on the MINA blockchain for 1 year and deployment of Mina NFT
DeploymentofMinaNFTpost: Deployment of Mina NFT post to the MINA blockchain
SupportbyMinaNFTteam: Support - one hour of support by the MinaNFT team through Zoom or Telegram call or chat
PurchaseofAvatarNFT: Purchase of the MINA Avatar NFT name on the MINA blockchain
